page.title: 15Timsbury School.
page.content: { Timsbury School}has 212 children aged from 4 to 11 in 7 classes. Most come from{Timsbury,}a few from{Radford and{Tunley.}The number in school is expected to remain fairly constant.The school was built in 1934 as a Secondary school and changed to a Primary in 1971.There is a 5 acre playing field and 2 playgrounds.There are many after_school activities.These include clubs for cricket,netball,gym, choir,football,stamps,recorders and computers. There is an active PTA and parents also come in to help during the school day.School meals are cooked in the school's own kitchen and are very good.The uniform is light blue and dark blue.The school has been redecorated inside and out in 1985.
